title: One House Left
description: R.L. Stine meets Urban Legend in the next twisty horror novel by New York Times bestselling author Vincent Ralph.“Ready or not. Whatever you do. The Hiding Boy is coming for you.”Sixteen-year-old Nate Campbell grew up in the shadow of Murder Road – a street cursed by the vengeful spirit of the Hiding Boy.Every few years, for nearly six decades, a different house on that street has been the scene of a tragedy.Nate and his family move to a new town as they try to outrun the curse once and for all. But, when he is pulled into his new friends’ urban legend club, new ghost stories merge with old until there is nowhere left to run.
author: Vincent Ralph
